channel.title: How to Start a Non Profit
channel.description: How to Start a Non Profit

item.title: The resume that proves it's possible.
item.description:
The resume that proves it's possible.

Point blank- I had no reason to get in the position I was in. Looking down at my laptop in a Starbucks, I was thrilled to open an e-mail I just received from a board member, in which I anticipated glowing responses on my first projected budget.

item.title: I did it. You can too.
item.description:
I did it. You can too. 

Three years ago, just like you, I had the nagging thought in the back of my head. I wanted to do good, I wanted to help somebody else, and I wanted an organization for the platform to do so.
